languages.text: "Несчастное создание... В цепях мон-кай все обречено на погибель и разрушение".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Несчастное дитя Иши... В цепях мон-кай все обречено на погибель и разрушение".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Such a desolate creature... All that finds its way into the chains of the mon-keigh is doomed to ruin."

languages.text: “如此凄苦的生物……所有被猴子拴上铁链的东西，都注定难逃一劫。”
languages.original_text: "Such a desolate creature... All that finds its way into the chains of the mon-keigh is doomed to ruin."

traits.locale_text: “如此凄苦的生物……所有被猴子拴上铁链的东西，都注定难逃一劫。”

languages.text: «Qué criatura tan lastimera... Todo lo que acaba en las cadenas de los mon-keigh está condenado a la ruina».
languages.original_text: "Such a desolate creature... All that finds its way into the chains of the mon-keigh is doomed to ruin."

traits.locale_text: «Qué criatura tan lastimera... Todo lo que acaba en las cadenas de los mon-keigh está condenado a la ruina».

languages.text: 「なんと荒涼とした生き物か…モン＝ケイの鎖に絡まるものはすべて、破滅を免れない」
languages.original_text: "Such a desolate creature... All that finds its way into the chains of the mon-keigh is doomed to ruin."

traits.locale_text: 「なんと荒涼とした生き物か…モン＝ケイの鎖に絡まるものはすべて、破滅を免れない」

languages.text: "Ne kadar da perişan bir varlık... Mon-keighlerin zincirlediği her şey, mahvolmaya mahkûmdur."
languages.original_text: "Such a desolate creature... All that finds its way into the chains of the mon-keigh is doomed to ruin."
